programme.title: Ema
programme.desc: Ema, une jeune danseuse de reggaeton, est en instance divorce avec Gastón, le chorégraphe de la compagnie dans laquelle elle travaille. Le couple se déchire depuis l'échec de l'adoption de Polo, un jeune Colombien qui a brûlé gravement la jeune sœur d'Ema. Tandis qu’Ema reproche amèrement à son mari sa stérilité, qui les a amenés à adopter, Gastón l’accuse d’être une mauvaise mère. Suite au drame, le couple a rendu l’enfant aux services sociaux. Une situation qui a fragilisé le couple qui était pourtant très uni. Désemparée, Ema cherche à changer de vie.

programme.title: Ramdam
programme.desc: Amine, brillant professeur d'histoire des civilisations, à Bordeaux, est courtisé par une université de Boston. Mais avant de partir aux Etats-Unis avec sa femme et ses enfants, il veut régler la vente d'une maison de famille à Saint-Marsain, village où réside son papa Rachid, président du club de rugby local. Les deux hommes ont des relations conflictuelles. Amine est furieux lorsqu'il découvre que son père a acheté les murs de la petite mosquée afin de transformer le lieu en discothèque pour fêter les fins de match.

programme.title: Tuer un homme
programme.desc: Matteo Belmonte et sa femme, Christine, tiennent une bijouterie dans une petite ville du sud de la France. Un jour, un homme fait irruption dans leur magasin et pointe une arme sur Christine en lui ordonnant de lui donner des bijoux. Matteo surgit alors de son atelier et tire sur le braqueur à deux reprises. Le voleur finit par prendre la fuite à scooter avec un complice mais décède peu après.

programme.title: Irresponsable
programme.sub-title: S2 E9 La fête à la maison

programme.title: Irresponsable
programme.sub-title: S2 E10 Ne nous précipitons pas

programme.title: Antigone
programme.desc: Antigone, une jeune fille d’origine kabyle, a immigré au Québec quand elle était enfant avec sa grand-mère, sa sœur Ismène et ses deux frères Etéocle et Polynice. Cette élève brillante se met en tête de faire évader son frère Polynice, incarcéré à la suite d'une altercation avec des policiers lors de laquelle leur frère aîné, Etéocle, s'est fait tuer. Un jour, accompagnée de sa grand-mère, Antigone, transformée en garçon, rend visite à Polynice. Sitôt dans l'isoloir, elle change d'identité avec lui. Antigone est vite démasquée. Et Polynice est en cavale.

programme.title: Le temps de l'aventure
programme.desc: Drame.

programme.title: Succession
Succession
programme.desc: Succession: Created by Jesse Armstrong. With Hiam Abbass, Nicholas Braun, Brian Cox, Kieran Culkin. The Roy family is known for controlling the biggest media and entertainment company in the world. However, their world changes when their father steps down from the company." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt7660850/","name":"Succession","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZDE0ODVlYjktNjJiMC00ODk4LWIwNTktMWRhZmZiOGFhYmUwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTkxNjUyNQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"The Roy family is known for controlling the biggest media and entertainment company in the world. However, their world changes when their father steps down from the company.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt7660850/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"jeroen-106"},"dateCreated":"2018-06-21","inLanguage":"English","name":"I don't understand the negativity.","reviewBody":"Characters are actually not one-dimensional as some people state here. Everyone is imperfect in this show. And even if they all seem greedy, they all have their weaknesses and their motivation is rooted deep in their personalities. For example the son who is temp CEO only wants his father's approval and pride, but gets rejected time after time. He plays the character very well. It's a healthy dose of drama and humor. I'm not sure yet about The Office - ish camerawork (sudden zooms) because it gives the impression of a mockumentary, as if the cameraman is there and just recording what is happening in real-time. It clashes a bit with the overall style of the show. Same for some of The Office style humor they brought to this show. But these are minor things that don't get in the way of the story.\n\nDefinitely recommended. Give it a few episodes!","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":65778,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8.7},"contentRating":"TV-MA","genre":["Drama"],"datePublished":"2018-06-03","keywords":"media empire,patriarchy,wealth,dysfunctional family,business","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0007814/","name":"Hiam Abbass"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1002609/","name":"Nicholas Braun"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0004051/","name":"Brian Cox"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0186190/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0702468/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0770923/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1104036/","name":"Jesse Armstrong"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Season 3 Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3233792793","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZjgxZDg0ZGItNTY4Ny00MmQ4LTg4M2QtNjA4NDYzMGI3Y2JiXkEyXkFqcGdeQWxiaWFtb250._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZjgxZDg0ZGItNTY4Ny00MmQ4LTg4M2QtNjA4NDYzMGI3Y2JiXkEyXkFqcGdeQWxiaWFtb250._V1_.jpg","description":"Ambushed by his rebellious son Kendall at the end of Season two, Logan Roy begins Season three in a perilous position, scrambling to secure familial, political, and financial alliances. programme.title: Lucky Strike
programme.desc: Jung-man, qui doit so'ccuper de sa mère malade, gagne modestement sa vie en faisant le ménage dans un sauna. Tout bascule quand il s'empare d'un gros sac de marque, trouvé dans une consigne du vestiaire et contenant une importante somme d'argent. De son côté, Tae-young, un agent des douanes, ne sait pas comment régler la dette qu'il a contractée auprès de monsieur Park, un impitoyable criminel. Mi-ran, régulièrement battu par son mari violent, ne sait pas comment faire pour s'éloigner de cet homme dangereux.

programme.title: L'exercice de l'État
programme.desc: Ministre des Transports de la République française, Bertrand Saint-Jean est appelé en pleine nuit. Un autocar s'est renversé sur une route de campagne. Accompagné de sa directrice de communication, il se rend sur place pour se recueillir et parler aux médias. Gilles, son fidèle et expérimenté chef de cabinet, reste, quant à lui, à Paris. D'autres sujets sensibles réclament l'attention du ministère.

programme.title: Ceux qui travaillent
programme.desc: Frank, cadre supérieur dans une compagnie de fret maritime, est toujours le premier arrivé et le dernier parti à son travail. Sans avoir fait d'études mais à force de ténacité, il est parvenu à obtenir ce poste. Un jour, afin d'éviter de fortes pénalités à son entreprise, il se prend de franchir la ligne jaune en donnant un pot de vin à un capitaine de navire incompétent. La direction l'apprend et le licencie. Après un rendez-vous piège avec une entreprise concurrente, il a beaucoup de mal à retrouver un poste. Un ami finit par lui proposer un emploi où sa morale est mise à l'épreuve.

programme.title: L'heure zéro
programme.desc: Guillaume Neuville impose à sa seconde épouse Caroline un bref séjour en Bretagne dans le splendide manoir de la Pointe-aux-Mouettes de sa tante Camilla, une veuve aussi riche que charmante. Caroline est mécontente car Guillaume a eu l'idée de la réunir avec son ex-femme, Aude. Un matin, Camilla est retrouvée morte dans son lit, la tête ensanglantée. L'enquête est confiée au commissaire Martin Bataille.

programme.title: Court central
programme.desc: Court Central met en valeur les réalisateurs et les meilleurs courts du moment.

programme.title: Six Feet Under
programme.sub-title: S5 E10 Tout le monde est seul

programme.title: Honey Boy
programme.desc: Comédien enchaînant les projets, Otis a un problème d’alcool. Un jour, il a un accident de voiture. Arrêté, il doit suivre une cure de désintoxication dans le centre du docteur Moreno. Pour la thérapie, cette dernière lui demande de noter ses souvenirs. Otis repense alors à sa vie avec son père, un ancien clown alcoolique et violent, qui lui faisait office d’agent. Ils vivaient ensemble dans une chambre de motel. Au centre, Otis a du mal à participer aux activités de groupe, persuadé que la thérapie ne pourra pas l’aider. Il se replonge toutefois dans son passé.

programme.title: Ma bataille
programme.desc: Tristan s'est échappé de l'asile psychiatrique. Dans la rue, il aborde un passant ignorant tout de sa condition et lui affirme qu'il est le véritable père de sa fille. Contre toute attente, l'inconnu croit au récit de Tristan. Ne serait-il pas plus fou que son interlocuteur ? Le dernier court métrage ubuesque des réalisateurs Hugo Benamozig et David Caviglioli, qui ont signé depuis leur premier long, "Terrible jungle", avec Catherine Deneuve.

programme.title: Les hommes du feu
programme.desc: Dans une caserne de pompiers du Sud de la France, Philippe, le capitaine, envoie ses hommes à la poursuite de faux pompiers qui effectuent des collectes d'argent frauduleuses auprès des riverains. Peu de temps après, la vie, très masculine, de la caserne est transformée par l'arrivée de Bénédicte Meursault, adjudante-chef. Xavier, qui le même grade qu'elle, se pose des questions sur son statut auprès de Philippe. Dès sa première nuit de garde, Bénédicte, accompagnée de Xavier, intervient, par une forte pluie, sur un accident de la route.Découvrez les coulisses de ce film, tourné dans une vraie caserne de pompiers.

programme.title: Dévoilées
programme.desc: En 1970, Isabelle Sauser, 24 ans, vient d'accompagner son mari Laurent à l'aéroport lorsqu'elle apprend, deux heures plus tard, que l'avion de celui-ci vient de s'écraser. En 2018, Isabelle vit avec sa petite-fille de 21 ans, Anaïs, en Suisse. Un jour, elle l'aperçoit dans un train, entièrement voilée. Sans oser en parler à Anaïs, elle prévient aussitôt Léa. Laquelle saute dans un avion pour tenter de comprendre la conversion de sa fille, en pleine radicalisation. Si Isabelle refuse de confronter Anaïs à sa découverte par crainte de la faire fuir, cette conversion fait resurgir les fantômes de son passé.

programme.title: Palace Beach Hotel
programme.desc: Téléfilm dramatique.

programme.title: Anna et Otto
programme.desc: Anna et Otto sont frère et sœur. Alors qu'ils ont une vingtaine d'années, le divorce de leurs parents les sépare brutalement : Otto part vivre avec son père à Montréal tandis qu'Anna reste à Paris avec sa mère. Ils sont sûrs qu'ils se reverront vite, mais la vie et ses aléas les tiennent éloignés l'un de l'autre. Incapables de se montrer et de se dire qu'ils s'aiment, Anna et Otto se débattent avec maladresse dans le tumulte de leurs sentiments...

programme.title: Court central
programme.desc: Court Central met en valeur les réalisateurs et les meilleurs courts du moment.

programme.title: Les neiges du Kilimandjaro
programme.desc: Michel, délégué syndical, vient de se faire licencier. Bien que touché par la nouvelle, il organise néanmoins une fête avec son épouse Marie-Claire, pour célébrer leurs trente ans de mariage. Les invités leur offrent deux billets pour la Tanzanie ainsi qu'un petit pécule pour faire des visites. Un soir, alors qu'ils dînent avec Denise, la sœur de Marie-Claire, et son compagnon, Raoul, ils sont agressés par deux braqueurs qui dérobent l'argent.

programme.title: Le promeneur du Champ de Mars
programme.desc: En 1994, alors qu'il achève son second mandat et lutte contre un cancer, le président accepte de se confier à Antoine Moreau, un jeune journaliste qui souhaite écrire un livre sur lui. Délaissant quelque peu sa compagne Jeanne, Antoine passe des nuits entières à croiser ses sources. Il interroge le Président sur sa jeunesse. Mais ce dernier élude adroitement les questions gênantes.

programme.title: Elephant
programme.desc: A Portland, dans l'Oregon, un matin d'automne. Mr McFarland vient chercher son fils John pour le conduire au lycée. Voyant son père ivre, l'ado décide de prendre le volant. Sur le campus, John croise son ami Elias. Entre deux cours, Nathan retrouve sa fiancée Carrie tandis que Jordan, Brittany et Nicole chahutent et rient. Tout est calme en apparence. Au milieu de l'après-midi, Alex et Eric sortent des armes de leurs sac.

programme.title: Moi, Daniel Blake
programme.desc: Suite à une crise cardiaque, Daniel Blake, menuisier anglais presque sexagénaire, se retrouve dans l'impossibilité de reprendre son métier. Contredisant l’avis des médecins, une société privée, à laquelle l’administration sous-traite une partie de ses missions, le juge pourtant apte à travailler et le prive de la pension d’invalidité dont il pensait bénéficier. Désormais sans ressources, Daniel est obligé de s’inscrire au chômage. Il doit alors prouver à l'administration qu'il recherche activement un travail, sous peine de ne pas recevoir d'allocations.

programme.title: It's a Free World...
programme.desc: Envoyée en Pologne, Angie recrute des travailleurs pour le compte d'une agence d'intérim britannique. Mais elle est brusquement licenciée pour avoir repoussé les avances d'un des directeurs. Avec son amie Rose, elle décide d'ouvrir sa propre agence de recrutement à Londres. Elle contacte des directeurs d'usines et des chefs de chantiers, s'engageant à leur fournir la main-d'oeuvre dont ils ont besoin.

programme.title: Sorry to Bother You
programme.desc: A San Francisco, Cassius Green fait tout pour obtenir un modeste emploi dans une entreprise de télémarketing. L'homme, qui ne parvient plus à régler le loyer du garage que lui loue son oncle, voit ce nouveau poste comme une bénédiction. Mais bien qu'il suive à la lettre le script fourni par ses employeurs, Cassius ne parvient pas à vendre d'encyclopédies à ses interlocuteurs téléphoniques. Sur les conseils de Langston, un vétéran, Cassius, qui est Noir, commence à prendre une voix de Blanc. Le succès est immédiat.

programme.title: Succession
Succession
programme.desc: Succession: Created by Jesse Armstrong. With Hiam Abbass, Nicholas Braun, Brian Cox, Kieran Culkin. The Roy family is known for controlling the biggest media and entertainment company in the world. It clashes a bit with the overall style of the show. Same for some of The Office style humor they brought to this show. programme.title: The Handmaid's Tale
The Handmaid's Tale : La servante écarlate
programme.desc: The Handmaid's Tale: Created by Bruce Miller. With Elisabeth Moss, Yvonne Strahovski, Joseph Fiennes, Ann Dowd. Set in a dystopian future, a woman is forced to live as a concubine under a fundamentalist theocratic dictatorship." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt5834204/","name":"The Handmaid's Tale","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZGZiMTkzZjktNzk0OC00NzEzLWJjOTMtYjdkMWM1NGU1ZDM4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTEyMjM2NDc2._V1_.jpg","description":"Set in a dystopian future, a woman is forced to live as a concubine under a fundamentalist theocratic dictatorship.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt5834204/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Supermanfan-13"},"dateCreated":"2021-01-28","inLanguage":"English","name":"It's a tough watch but worth it!","reviewBody":"The Handmaid's Tale is one of the most infuriating, depressing, and most difficult to watch shows I've ever seen. You keep waiting for things to turn into June's favor or all the terrible people in the show to get what they have coming to them but it just never happens. It just keeps getting more and more depressing and hopeless! Having said all that it's still an incredible show that is so well acted and written that it is always nominated for all the major awards.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":204459,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8.4},"contentRating":"TV-MA","genre":["Drama","Sci-Fi","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2017-04-26","keywords":"rape,dystopia,violence against women,slavery,torture","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005253/","name":"Elisabeth Moss"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2088803/","name":"Yvonne Strahovski"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001212/","name":"Joseph Fiennes"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0071026/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0108881/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0588005/","name":"Bruce Miller"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Season 4 Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2726412313","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZTljMGNkYTMtMzE3MS00ZjM2LThjY2ItM2Q5YTVhYmI0ZmEzXkEyXkFqcGdeQXZ3ZXNsZXk@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZTljMGNkYTMtMzE3MS00ZjM2LThjY2ItM2Q5YTVhYmI0ZmEzXkEyXkFqcGdeQXZ3ZXNsZXk@._V1_.jpg","description":"Freedom is just the beginning. The Emmy-winning series, The Handmaid's Tale, returns for Season 4 on April 28, 2021, only on Hulu.\n\nThe cultural phenomenon picks up where we left off, with June's fight for freedom against Gilead. But the risks she takes bring unexpected and dangerous new challenges, and her desire for justice and revenge threaten to consume her and destroy her most cherished relationships."}}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: La Cordillère des songes
programme.desc: Alors qu'il survole en avion la Cordillère des Andes, le cinéaste Patricio Guzman, exilé depuis quarante ans lors de la dictature militaire, se souvient de sa ville de naissance, Santiago. Il repense également au rapport que les chiliens entretiennent avec la chaîne de montagnes, qu'ils aperçoivent quotidiennement représentée sur une fresque lorsqu'ils prennent le métro. Il évoque le sujet avec son ami à l'origine de cette fresque, Guillermo Munoz Vera. Alors que Guillermo, exilé comme lui, vit en Espagne, Guzman, lui, vit en France. Les deux hommes s'interrogent sur leur rapport à ce lieu et à l'histoire de leur pays.

programme.title: Zero Dark Thirty
programme.desc: Thriller.

programme.title: Truman Capote
programme.desc: En 1959. Truman Capote, 35 ans, est un écrivain très en vue de la côte Est des Etats-Unis : il brosse le portrait de personnalités pour le magazine «New Yorker» et sa nouvelle «Breakfast at Tiffany's» doit être adaptée au cinéma. Le 16 novembre, il apprend dans le «New York Times» qu'une famille de fermiers a été massacrée à Holcomb, au Kansas. Capote décide de s'y rendre pour interroger les habitants et tenter de comprendre ce meurtre.

programme.title: Une histoire d'âme
programme.desc: Téléfilm dramatique.

programme.title: La sorcière de Noël
programme.desc: Comme chaque année, la Befana, la sorcière préférée des petits italiens, parcourt les villes du pays juchée sur son balais pour distribuer, dans les chaussettes laissées par les bambins, des cadeaux aux enfants sages et du charbon pour ceux qui le sont moins. Mais cette nuit, perturbée par un chien, la Befana n'a pas eu le temps de donner son cadeau à un petit garçon. Vingt-cinq ans plus tard, la Befana oeuvre toujours de nuit, pour préparer celle du 6 janvier, tandis qu'elle se dissimule le jour sous celle de Paola, une institutrice.

programme.title: La jeune fille et son aigle
programme.desc: En Mongolie, Aisholpan, une jeune fille kazakh âgée de treize ans, tente de s'imposer en tant que dresseuse d'aigles royaux, un métier réservé aux hommes. Avec l'aide de son père, elle décide d'adopter un aigle pour en faire un chasseur de renards.

programme.title: True Grit
programme.desc: Arkansas, 1870. Mattie Ross, 14 ans, n'a qu'une idée en tête : venger son père, lâchement assassiné par Tom Chaney, un de ses employés. Cette adolescente obstinée se met en tête de faire traquer et tuer ce dernier. Pour mener à bien cette mission, elle tente d'embaucher Rooster Cogburn, un marshal vieillissant. Alcoolique et irascible, ce dernier ne se laisse pas convaincre facilement. Mais Mattie n'est pas la seule à vouloir mettre la main sur Tom Chaney. Appâté par la récompense promise au Texas pour sa capture, le ranger LaBoeuf se joint alors à eux.

programme.title: Lulu femme nue
programme.desc: Parce qu'elle a manqué d'assurance au cours d'un entretien d'embauche, Lulu, mariée et mère de trois enfants, n'obtient pas le poste de secrétaire espéré. Sans aucune préméditation, cette quadragénaire timorée et complexée décide de ne pas rentrer chez elle. Lulu s’octroie quelques jours de liberté dans une ville balnéaire de Vendée. Dans sa quête de renaissance, elle rencontre alors trois individus qui vont l'aider à se retrouver : un repris de justice au cœur tendre, une vieille dame malicieuse et une jeune serveuse malmenée par sa patronne tyrannique.

programme.title: Grand Central
programme.desc: Drame.

programme.title: Sonic, le film
programme.desc: Sonic, un hérisson bleu qui court à une vitesse incroyable, est poursuivi dans les rues de San Francisco par le docteur Ivo Robotnik, un scientifique fou et moustachu. La créature se souvient alors de son enfance, sur une île très lointaine, protégé par le hibou Longclaw. C'est ce même Longclaw qui va envoyer Sonic sur Terre alors que sa vie est menacée par d'inquiétantes créatures. Dix années passent et le hérisson vit désormais dans la petite ville de Green Hillsl, en plein coeur du Montana, où il multiplie les records de vitesse sur les routes, intrigant le policier Tom Wachowski.

programme.title: Obama
programme.desc: En 2007, Barack Obama annonce sa candidature à l'élection présidentielle. Sa campagne s'avère harassante tant il doit combattre contre de nombreux adversaires politiques. Jelani Cobb, David Axelrod, John Lewis, Cornel West, Jesse Jackson ou encore Ta-Nehisi Coates reviennent sur des moments marquants de cette période et analysent, avec le recul, l'importance de certains discours et engagements du candidat, poussé sans cesse à définir son identité.

programme.title: Obama
programme.desc: En 2007, Barack Obama annonce sa candidature à l'élection présidentielle qui aura lieu l'année suivante. Sa campagne se révèle harassante, tant il doit se battre sur tous les fronts, contre ses adversaires politiques mais également au sein de sa propre famille démocrate. Jelani Cobb, David Axelrod, John Lewis, Cornel West, Jesse Jackson ou encore Ta-Nehisi Coates reviennent sur des moments marquants de cette période et analysent, avec le recul, l'importance de certains discours et engagements du candidat, poussé sans cesse à définir son identité. Ce deuxième volet se consacre à l'intense période précédant l'élection de Barack Obama et mesure l'impact de celle-ci sur la vie des Américains.

programme.title: Madagascar 2
programme.desc: Après avoir fui New York et échoué à Madagascar, Alex le lion, Marty le zèbre, Melman la girafe et Gloria l'hippopotame, parviennent à atteindre les plaines d'Afrique grâce à l'aide des pingouins, qui ont réparé l'épave d'un avion. Là, tous ont l'occasion de renouer avec leurs familles éloignées et leurs racines. Marty est comme un poisson dans l'eau, tandis qu'Alex, trop habitué au béton de la Grosse Pomme, ne retrouve pas ses instincts. Quant à la girafe, elle tente par tous les moyens d'avouer son amour à Gloria tandis que celle-ci est courtisée de toutes parts.

programme.title: Madagascar 3 : Bons baisers d'Europe
programme.desc: Alex le lion, Marty le zèbre, Gloria l'hippopotame et Melman la girafe sont toujours en Afrique. Ils souhaitent rentrer à New York et décident de rallier Monte-Carlo, pour profiter de l'avion de leurs amis les pingouins. Là, ils sont pris en chasse par le redoutable Capitaine Chantal Dubois mais réussissent à lui échapper. Dans les Alpes, Alex et les siens croisent la route d'un cirque itinérant. Ils y voient un bon moyen de retourner aux Etats-Unis.

programme.title: Remember Me
programme.desc: Claude, un critique de théâtre, vit à Monterey et passe beaucoup de temps avec Shane, son ami et voisin, depuis la mort de sa femme. L'octogénaire s'apprête à accueillir sa fille, Selma, et sa petite fille, Tania, qui quittent leur domicile après que le mari de Selma, un politicien en vue, s'est mis dans une situation dégradante, attirant l'attention des médias. En attendant, Claude, tente d'écrire à nouveau pour le journal de Monterey, qui l'a longtemps employé. C'est alors qu'il apprend que Lillian, son amour de jeunesse, désormais atteinte de la maladie d'Alzheimer, vit dans une maison de retraite.

programme.title: Madame Claude
programme.desc: A Paris, à la fin des années 1960, Fernande Grudet est à la tête d'une maison close très réputée. Plus connue sous le pseudonyme de Madame Claude, elle dirige avec rigueur et fermeté son établissement, discret mais fréquenté par des personnalités, des policiers et parfois même des politiques. Elle applique la même fermeté quand elle choisit ses nouvelles prostituées. Parmi ses nouvelle recrues, une jeune femme se distingue nettement : Sidonie, venue de la bonne société, dotée d'un bon carnet d'adresse et d'une forte personnalité, séduit rapidement Madame Claude.

programme.title: Life in a Year
programme.desc: Daryn est à une année charnière de sa vie. Très surveillé par son père Xavier, le jeune homme, en dernière année de lycée, se concentre sur ses études et candidate à Harvard. C'est en se rendant à un concert avec ses meilleurs amis Sammy et Kiran qu'il fait la connaissance d'Isabelle, très libre, en tout point différente de lui. Alors que Daryn est immédiatement séduit par Isabelle, la jeune femme, qui a plus conscience de ce qui les sépare, se montre plutôt distante. Pourtant, à force d'obstination, Daryn parvient à se rapprocher d'elle.

programme.title: Sonic, le film
programme.desc: Sonic, un hérisson bleu qui court à une vitesse incroyable, est poursuivi dans les rues de San Francisco par le docteur Ivo Robotnik, un scientifique fou et moustachu. La créature se souvient alors de son enfance, sur une île très lointaine, protégé par le hibou Longclaw. C'est ce même Longclaw qui va envoyer Sonic sur Terre alors que sa vie est menacée par d'inquiétantes créatures. Dix années passent et le hérisson vit désormais dans la petite ville de Green Hillsl, en plein coeur du Montana, où il multiplie les records de vitesse sur les routes, intrigant le policier Tom Wachowski.

programme.title: Fini de jouer
programme.desc: A 32 ans, Abe Applebaum n'est plus que l'ombre de ce qu'il a été. Détective prodige dès l'âge de 13 ans, le jeune homme a connu une certaine notoriété avant de déchoir sévèrement. Désormais légèrement alcoolique, Abe, 32 ans, vit toujours dans la ville pavillonnaire de Willowbrook, sous le regard navré de ses parents et en est réduit à traiter des affaires mineures, souvent très mal rémunérées. Tout change quand Caroline, une de ses anciennes clientes, vient le voir pour l'aider à résoudre le meurtre de son petit ami, tué de 17 coups de couteaux.

programme.title: Les heures sombres
programme.desc: Le 9 mai 1940, alors qu'Adolf Hitler a envahi la Tchécoslovaquie, la Pologne, le Danemark et la Norvège, trois millions de soldats allemands sont stationnés à la frontière belges, prêts à envahir le reste de l'Europe. En Angleterre, le Parlement a perdu confiance en Neville Chamberlain, qui cherchait à préserver la paix à n'importe quel prix, et doit lui trouver, très rapidement, un remplaçant. Un nom semble se démarquer, celui du conservateur Winston Churchill, aux positions radicalement opposées à celles de Chamberlain.

programme.title: Bienvenue à Marwen
programme.desc: Pendant la Seconde Guerre mondiale, le capitaine Hogie sort in extremis de son avion qui vient de s'écraser dans la campagne belge. Il est bientôt encerclé par des soldats allemands avant d'être sauvé par un commando de jeunes femmes lourdement armées. Mais le capitaine Hogie, ses ennemis et ses sauveuses sont des poupées que Mark Hogencamp manipule et photographie image par image dans son jardin. Cette activité est une forme de thérapie pour l'homme, qui s'est retrouvé amnésique après avoir été violemment agressé par cinq hommes.

programme.title: Burden
programme.desc: Au printemps 1966, à Laurens, une ville pauvre de Caroline du Sud, Mike Burden gagne modestement sa vie en effectuant des saisies pour le compte de Tom Griffin, véritable figure paternelle, chez des mauvais payeurs. C'est au cours d'une de ses missions qu'il fait la connaissance de Judy, mère divorcée d'un garçon, à laquelle il s'attache immédiatement. Mais ce que Judy ignore, c'est que Mike, Tom et leurs amis, racistes, viennent de prendre possession d'un cinéma désaffecté pour le transformer en musée glorifiant les actions passée du Klu Klux Klan. Le révérend Kenndy, qui tente d'apaiser les tensions entre les communautés, est consterné par cette nouvelle.

programme.title: Le château de Cagliostro
programme.desc: Cambrioleur de renommée internationale, Edgar vient de réaliser le casse d'un casino. Mais il s'aperçoit que les billets qu'il a volés sont des faux. Il s'envole alors avec son compère Jigen pour le royaume de Cagliostro afin d'enquêter sur ce réseau de fausse monnaie. Sur place, ils viennent à la rescousse d'une jeune fille, pourchasée par des bandits. Il s'agit en fait de Clarisse, la princesse du royaume. Celle-ci doit bientôt être mariée contre son gré au sinistre comte de Cagliostro, qui règne sur le pays. Leur tentative échoue et Clarisse est bientôt enfermée dans le château du comte.

programme.title: Argo
programme.desc: En 1979, lors de la prise de l'ambassade américaine à Téhéran par les révolutionnaires iraniens, soixante Américains sont pris en otage. Mais, au beau lieu du chaos, six employés parviennent à s'échapper. Ils se réfugient au domicile de l'ambassadeur canadien. Tony Mendez, agent de la CIA spécialiste de l'exfiltration, tente de trouver un plan pour les sauver. Il a l'idée de faire passer les employés pour des techniciens de cinéma venus en repérage en Iran pour tourner un film de science-fiction. Ce thriller dramatique est inspiré de faits vécus.

programme.title: HP
programme.desc: Après avoir fui un dîner particulièrement rébarbatif, Sheila se rend compte qu'elle se sent définitivement mieux à l'hôpital que dans sa vie privée. Elle commence à s'éloigner d'Aymeric, son petit ami, et à se rapprocher dangereusement d'Ulysse..

programme.title: HP
programme.desc: Sheila se sent responsable de l'incendie déclenché par Ulysse. Préoccupée par le comportement étrange de Jimmy depuis quelques jours, elle fait faire, en cachette, des analyses toxicologiques à l'un de ses chevaux..

programme.title: Shrek 4 : il était une fin
programme.desc: Ayant regagné sa demeure avec femme et enfants, Shrek devrait être heureux. Mais il s'ennuie. Plus personne ne le craint. Lors de la fête d'anniversaire de ses enfants, les tensions s'accumulent pour l'ogre. Les trois petits cochons dévorent le gâteau. Shrek craque et finit par se mettre terriblement en colère. S'éloignant, il rencontre Tracassin, un sorcier qui lui propose un pacte. Contre une signature sur un contrat, il lui offre la possibilité de redevenir un véritable ogre. Shrek accepte… et se réveille dans un monde où plus personne ne le connaît !

programme.title: Mare of Easttown
Mare of Easttown
programme.desc:
Mare of Easttown: Created by Brad Ingelsby. With Kate Winslet, Julianne Nicholson, Jean Smart, Angourie Rice. A detective in a small Pennsylvania town investigates a local murder while trying to keep her life from falling apart." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt10155688/","name":"Mare of Easttown","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYjIyOGU1NzAtODZmYi00NGMzLWJiMjItNGNjNTFjOTM5ZDJhXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTEyMjM2NDc2._V1_.jpg","description":"A detective in a small Pennsylvania town investigates a local murder while trying to keep her life from falling apart.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt10155688/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"veinctor"},"dateCreated":"2021-04-27","inLanguage":"English","name":"Respectful and smart","reviewBody":"Two episodes in and I can easily say that this series treats its audience with respect as it trusts that they pay attention.

Character introduction is not easy and here are revealed bit by bit, creating mystery. The protagonist is a grandma? But her daughter is too young for that. And then we meet the grandchild mom. And she is not the protagonists daughter. And the grandchild reveals his dad's name as he is naming a turtle. The episodes require your attention to put two and two together and make sence of them for your self.

I love the pacing, the non-nonsense drama, the characters involved.... Everything feels quite realistic as the protagonist (a police detective that tries to solve a cold case and a new crime at the same time) talk to people with intriguing background motivations secrets. Also you can see the entire families for many of the characters involved, giving the feeling that everyone is an actual living person with their own lives. Something you don't easily see in TV series due to budget restrictions.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":109056,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8.5},"contentRating":"TV-MA","genre":["Crime","Drama","Mystery"],"datePublished":"2021-04-18","keywords":"murder,murder investigation,missing persons case,female detective,missing women","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000701/","name":"Kate Winslet"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0629855/","name":"Julianne Nicholson"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005443/","name":"Jean Smart"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0008693/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0093869/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0698419/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2145487/","name":"Brad Ingelsby"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3833774105","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMDE0N2NhYWUtNzIyNS00NDFmLThlM2YtZTUxZTQ0MjI5MGIzXkEyXkFqcGdeQWRvb2xpbmhk._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMDE0N2NhYWUtNzIyNS00NDFmLThlM2YtZTUxZTQ0MjI5MGIzXkEyXkFqcGdeQWRvb2xpbmhk._V1_.jpg","description":"Academy Award®-winner Kate Winslet plays Mare Sheehan, a small-town Pennsylvania detective who investigates a local murder as life crumbles around her. "}}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: SOKO Kitzbühel

programme.title: Nomis
programme.desc: En pleine nuit, sur une autoroute, une jeune femme meurt accidentellement après avoir fui un agresseur encapuchonné. Quelques heures plus tard, Walter Marshall, lieutenant de police, passe récupérer Faye, sa fille, qui vit alternativement chez lui et chez Angie, son ex-femme, avant d'être placé sur l'affaire. Il retrouve alors Rachel , ancienne psychologue, qui travaille désormais avec l'équipe de cybercriminalité. Pendant ce temps, Cooper, un e=sexagénaire, traque les criminels sexuels avec la complicité de Lara, une jeune femme qui lui sert d'appât.

programme.title: Fin des programmes
programme.desc: Zwischen 21 Uhr und 6 Uhr legt KiKA eine Sendepause ein.

programme.title: [MI-5]
programme.sub-title: S6 E4 La femme du consul

programme.title: SOKO Kitzbühel
programme.desc: Spécialiste funéraire, Armin Kuschner doit faire face à la mort de son propre fils, Tobias, victime d'un meurtre. Ce dernier travaillait dans un restaurant situé sur un golf. Ses relations avec le patron du golf pourraient être à l'origine de sa mort.

programme.title: SOKO Kitzbühel
programme.desc: Un meurtre a lieu dans les locaux du tribunal de Braunkirchen. Des débris retrouvés près du corps indiquent que le meurtrier a utilisé une arme fabriquée grâce à une imprimante 3D.

programme.title: SOKO Kitzbühel
programme.desc: Le psychothérapeute Daniel Suttner est également le directeur d'une mystérieuse communauté. Quand la comtesse Schönberg et son amie Kirsten découvrent son cadavre dans les bois, les suspects ne manquent pas.

programme.title: SOKO Kitzbühel
programme.desc: Simone Katzian, le coroner d'Innsbruck, a découvert les pratiques douteuses de certains de ses collègues. Elle est victime d'un meurtre qui plonge les enquêteurs dans les arcanes du milieu médical.

programme.title: DCI Banks
programme.sub-title: S5 E1 Je te porterai dans mon sang

programme.title: Unforgotten : le passé déterré
programme.desc: Peu avant sa mort, David Walker voulait retrouver celui qui avait abusé de lui dans son enfance. L'inspectrice Cassie Stuart recherche un violeur potentiel qui serait âgé de 80 ans environ. Jason Walker la sollicite et demande à voir son père à la morgue pour lui dire au revoir. James Gregory, restaurateur et ami de David, témoigne à son tour. Il révèle que les femmes, l'alcool et la drogue aidaient David à oublier sa honte d'avoir été victime d'agression sexuelle et de n'avoir rien dit à personne.

programme.title: Unforgotten : le passé déterré
programme.desc: Les enquêteurs poursuivent leurs investigations sur Colin, Sara et Marion. Cassie veut aussi savoir ce que Tessa a fait 48 heures avant la disparition de David Walker, son mari. Puis les policiers font une terrible découverte sur lui. Il était pédophile. Cassie décide d'étudier sa vie en profondeur pour savoir si des victimes ont voulu se venger. L'une d'elles témoigne et raconte que David organisa des réunions dans une maison entre des adultes et des mineurs entre 1981 et 1983.

programme.title: Marcella
programme.desc: La police découvre qu'un lien existe entre Grace Gibson et Marcella. Quand Sylvie découvre l'histoire, Jason se retrouve sur la sellette.

I admit the show in vulgar but cleans up as the show continues and the town grows from a miner's camp to a town. Don't let the first few episodes scare you off. programme.review:
IMDb data; ttnr: 0118421, Title: Oz, --- Description: Oz: Created by Tom Fontana. With Ernie Hudson, J.K. Simmons, Lee Tergesen, Dean Winters. A series chronicling the daily activities of an unusual prison facility and its criminal inhabitants." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0118421/","name":"Oz","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYjY3N2M2YjgtZTFjZS00ODA1LWJjMDgtNDgxZDllZWFiMmYyXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNDIzMzcwNjc@._V1_.jpg","description":"A series chronicling the daily activities of an unusual prison facility and its criminal inhabitants.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0118421/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"cchase","dateCreated":"2000-02-02","inLanguage":"English","name":"Do NOT pass go, do not travel down this "Yellow Brick Road"...","reviewBody":"...if what you want is the usual depiction that passes for prison life in a dramatic format. No SHAWSHANK REDEMPTION here, folks, no benevolent GREEN MILE guards or saintly supernatural inmates. OZ tells it like it is, and baby, it ain't pretty.

Using at times a sense of hyper-realism, (in the narrations of the excellent Harold Perrineau, who serves as the show's conscience and Greek chorus), OZ shows us both the profane and profound aspects of prison life that we good, law-abiding citizens don't like to think about. We have the "authorities" to take care of that, don't we?

Exceptional art, no matter what the medium, has the ability to move us, make us think, make us feel both things we embrace and things we reject. The power this show has to polarize viewers into two different camps--love it or hate it--is proof enough that Tom Fontana and Barry Levinson, the forces behind HOMICIDE: LIFE ON THE STREETS, have fashioned something we haven't seen the likes of in a very long time.

I would strongly suggest that anyone who has not yet seen it give it a try, if you have HBO. Then I dare you to tear yourself away from it. It's rare television that makes you sit up, take notice, and actually care about even the minor characters in an ensemble such as this, no matter how heinous their crimes, or how street-and-battle-hardened their exteriors.

Augustus Hill, Simon Adebisi, Tobias Beecher, Vern Schillinger, Chris Keller, Jefferson Keane, Ryan O'Reilly, Kareem Said, Nino Schibetta, Bob Rebadow, Tim McManus, Warden Leo Glynn, Sister Peter-Marie, Father Ray, Officer Diane Wittlesey and all the others will imprint themselves on your memory and stay there, until you can't wait to find out what happens next.

A blend of black humor and outright horror, cutting commentary and the basest brutality, it is one of the very few shows being done now that can reveal the most majestic qualities of the human spirit. The ongoing struggle to resist surrendering to impulses and urges that cause the evil that men do, in the one place you would least expect to find any light--in a sea of human misery and darkness.","aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":93779,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8.7,"contentRating":"TV-MA","genre":["Crime","Drama","Thriller"],"datePublished":"1997-07-12","keywords":"male rape,prison,italian,gay,aryan brotherhood","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001368/","name":"Ernie Hudson","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0799777/","name":"J.K. Simmons","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0855564/","name":"Lee Tergesen"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0030480/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0068745/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0284956/","name":"Tom Fontana"],"trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Oz: The Complete First Season","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2476671257","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTBjMTgxOTQtNTYyYy00YWM2LWIzMmMtZGRkNDBjNmYyMmY5XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTBjMTgxOTQtNTYyYy00YWM2LWIzMmMtZGRkNDBjNmYyMmY5XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Home Video Trailer from HBO Home Video"</script><metacontent="

programme.desc: The Deuce: Created by George Pelecanos, David Simon. With James Franco, Maggie Gyllenhaal, Lawrence Gilliard Jr., Margarita Levieva. An Atlantic City politician plays both sides of the law by conspiring with gangsters during the Prohibition era." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0979432/","name":"Boardwalk Empire","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYTYxNzc5ZmYtODcyNi00ZWUwLWExNWUtY2Y0YTlhZDBlMGU1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzQ1ODk3MTQ@._V1_.jpg","description":"An Atlantic City politician plays both sides of the law by conspiring with gangsters during the Prohibition era.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0979432/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"851222","dateCreated":"2010-09-22","inLanguage":"English","name":"Simply ... WOW!","reviewBody":"Greetings from Lithuania.

What a wonderful pilot!

First i read some reviews before watching pilot, and they where saying how "boooring" this episode was. Hell no! That was one of the best pilots in a ... ever! When you have screenwriter of "Sopranos" and Mr. M.Scorsese in a director chair - nothing can go wrong! A pilot of "Boardwalk Empire" reminded my of "Goodfellas", "Sopranos" (i read that behind this show is a writer of "Sopranos" after watching pilot) and ... "Departed" - it's was THAT good.

If this show will live up to the pilot - we have a new Emmy winner in all possible categories.

Watch it and don't wary about negative reviews - this is a really great show.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":179358,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8.5,"contentRating":"TV-MA","genre":["Crime","Drama","History"],"datePublished":"2010-09-19","keywords":"prohibition,gangster,murder,atlantic city new jersey,1920s","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000114/","name":"Steve Buscemi","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0531808/","name":"Kelly Macdonald","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0788335/","name":"Michael Shannon"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0008693/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0092329/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0198598/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1010540/","name":"Terence Winter"],"trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"What Jesus Said","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3198988057","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOTc1NzUxODA1OF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwODE0NDAzMzE@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOTc1NzUxODA1OF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwODE0NDAzMzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Watch a scene from an episode of "Boardwalk Empire"."</script><metacontent="

programme.review: IMDb data; ttnr: 8594276, Title: Jett, --- Description: Jett: Created by Sebastian Gutierrez. With Carla Gugino, Elena Anaya, Michael Aronov, Gaite Jansen. World-class thief Daisy "Jett" Kowalski is just out of prison and already being forced back into what got her there, by a group of eccentric and dangerous criminals." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt8594276/","name":"Jett","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNzRkNjU4OTMtODQ4Ni00YWI2LWJiMDQtMTM2YTY3YmMxYzNkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTkxNjUyNQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"World-class thief Daisy "Jett" Kowalski is just out of prison and already being forced back into what got her there, by a group of eccentric and dangerous criminals.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt8594276/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"marlonjomar","dateCreated":"2019-07-30","inLanguage":"English","name":"Razor Sharp Neo Noir With Humor","reviewBody":"JETT is unlike anything else on TV. Several notches above Cinemax fare. People keep comparing it to Tarantino and Leonard but... there's other forces at work here. Female, Latin American, European influences. Like Dario Argento, Brian De Palma and Steve Soderbergh collaborating on some strange brew of female centric crime noir. Very very odd. Moving. Razor sharp. But when powerful crime lord Charlie Baudelaire (Giancarlo Esposito) lures her in with one last job (a jewel heist in Cuba with former flame and safecracker extraordinaire, Quinn (Mustafa Shakir)), she's back in the game – and she's playing to win. "</script><metacontent="

programme.review:
IMDb data; ttnr: 4270492, Title: Billions, --- Description: Billions: Created by Brian Koppelman, David Levien, Andrew Ross Sorkin. With Paul Giamatti, Damian Lewis, Maggie Siff, David Costabile. U.S. Attorney Chuck Rhoades goes after hedge fund king Bobby "Axe" Axelrod in a battle between two powerful New York figures." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt4270492/","name":"Billions","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMzk2MDk5YzEtZDUzZC00Yjc2LWI1MmYtNzBmMzQ4NmJiNjQwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyOTA3MTMyOTk@._V1_.jpg","description":"U.S. Attorney Chuck Rhoades goes after hedge fund king Bobby "Axe" Axelrod in a battle between two powerful New York figures.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt4270492/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"modironak","dateCreated":"2016-01-20","inLanguage":"English","name":"Best of 2016","reviewBody":"Completed watching two episodes of this show and I am all of praise for it. It contains features that excite me to go for a show like insider trading, corporate politics, courtroom scenes and complex characters. It is kind of on the same lines as Suits but an incremented version of it. The pilot starts with building of the two lead characters Chuck and Bobby while keeping up the tempo too. Between the two you cannot decide whom to root for as both have gray shades.

With the second episode it starts going deeper into past of their lives and what shaped them to being the way they are today. It is exciting to watch both of them go head to head to get better of each other. It is like a see-saw ride, you cannot predict what is in store for you.

If it goes the way it has started it can be one of the best shows of 2016. programme.review:
IMDb data; ttnr: 4270492, Title: Billions, --- Description: Billions: Created by Brian Koppelman, David Levien, Andrew Ross Sorkin. With Paul Giamatti, Damian Lewis, Maggie Siff, David Costabile. U.S. Attorney Chuck Rhoades goes after hedge fund king Bobby "Axe" Axelrod in a battle between two powerful New York figures." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt4270492/","name":"Billions","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMzk2MDk5YzEtZDUzZC00Yjc2LWI1MmYtNzBmMzQ4NmJiNjQwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyOTA3MTMyOTk@._V1_.jpg","description":"U.S. Attorney Chuck Rhoades goes after hedge fund king Bobby "Axe" Axelrod in a battle between two powerful New York figures.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt4270492/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"modironak","dateCreated":"2016-01-20","inLanguage":"English","name":"Best of 2016","reviewBody":"Completed watching two episodes of this show and I am all of praise for it. It contains features that excite me to go for a show like insider trading, corporate politics, courtroom scenes and complex characters. It is kind of on the same lines as Suits but an incremented version of it. The pilot starts with building of the two lead characters Chuck and Bobby while keeping up the tempo too. Between the two you cannot decide whom to root for as both have gray shades.

With the second episode it starts going deeper into past of their lives and what shaped them to being the way they are today. It is exciting to watch both of them go head to head to get better of each other. It is like a see-saw ride, you cannot predict what is in store for you.

If it goes the way it has started it can be one of the best shows of 2016. I would recommend to give a try to this show, you will not regret it.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":80927,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8.4,"contentRating":"TV-MA","genre":["Drama"],"datePublished":"2016-01-01","keywords":"u.s. attorney,hedge fund,white collar crime,rivalry,profanity","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0316079/","name":"Paul Giamatti","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0507073/","name":"Damian Lewis","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1745019/","name":"Maggie Siff"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0048667/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0695646/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0002718/","name":"Brian Koppelman","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0505522/","name":"David Levien","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3376444/","name":"Andrew Ross Sorkin"],"trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Season 6 - Official Teaser","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3918643993","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYjk2MTU4NzEtNjQ5NC00ZDVmLWI3ZGUtMTQwOTRjNjFjNmM2XkEyXkFqcGdeQWFuaW5vc2M@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYjk2MTU4NzEtNjQ5NC00ZDVmLWI3ZGUtMTQwOTRjNjFjNmM2XkEyXkFqcGdeQWFuaW5vc2M@._V1_.jpg","description":"U.S. Attorney Chuck Rhoades goes after hedge fund king Bobby "Axe" Axelrod in a battle between two powerful New York figures."</script><metacontent="

programme.review:
IMDb data; ttnr: 1492179, Title: Strike Back, --- Description: Strike Back: With Philip Winchester, Sullivan Stapleton, Michelle Lukes, Daniel MacPherson. Follows the actions of Section 20, a secretive unit of British military intelligence. A team of special operations personnel conduct several high risk missions across the globe." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt1492179/","name":"Strike Back","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjgyNDk4ZTYtM2EzNC00MmU3LTg2MmQtYjdlMjA4ZmEwNzU5XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMzU5Njg5MDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"Follows the actions of Section 20, a secretive unit of British military intelligence. A team of special operations personnel conduct several high risk missions across the globe.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1492179/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"colind888","dateCreated":"2017-11-08","inLanguage":"English","name":""Struck Down"","reviewBody":"Whoever did the casting for Series 6 should be immediately taken out with an RPG. What were you thinking?? Replacing the god-like Philip Winchester, Sullivan Stapleton, Richard Armitage, Robson Green, Rhona Mitra and Andrew Lincoln with 3 midgets and a barbie doll all with dodgy accents. And to make matters worse, 20 is now being run by a timid girl from the BBC with a crush on Lord Grantham. You could not have got it more wrong if you had picked actors from the phone book.

I was really looking forward to the new season but so far The Brave is looking more polished and believable TV at every level. Totally disappointed!!

10 out of 10 for Series 1-4, 8 out of 10 for Series 5 and 5 out of 10 for this sad imitation.

Addendum: SE6E7 - unbelievable plot, unbelievable acting, unbelievable script, unbelievable romance, unbelievable decision making - just pathetic!! Lowering my rating on Season 6 to 3 stars and that is purely for the anthem "short change hero" which is all this debacle has left. Time to move on - RIP!!","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":30473,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8.2,"contentRating":"TV-MA","genre":["Action","Drama","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2010-05-05","keywords":"friendship,kidnapping,terrorism,revenge,obsession","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0934618/","name":"Philip Winchester","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0822982/","name":"Sullivan Stapleton","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1495675/","name":"Michelle Lukes"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0208971/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0042496/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0050995/"],"trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"First Look","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi209365273","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTcyOTg3MzY0OF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNDA1NjgxMDE@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTcyOTg3MzY0OF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNDA1NjgxMDE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Watch a teaser for the Cinemax limited series "Strike Back: Origins"."</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Bad Boys II
Bad Boys II
programme.desc:
Bad Boys II: Directed by Michael Bay. With Martin Lawrence, Will Smith, Jordi Mollà, Gabrielle Union. Two loose-cannon narcotics cops investigate the flow of Ecstasy into Florida from a Cuban drug cartel." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0172156/","name":"Bad Boys II","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZmU4NzVkZjEtZmQxMi00ZDY5LWI3ZDYtMWRmZjE5YmYwZjQzXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTQxNzMzNDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"Two loose-cannon narcotics cops investigate the flow of Ecstasy into Florida from a Cuban drug cartel.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0172156/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"pete-131"},"dateCreated":"2003-07-19","inLanguage":"English","name":"Ten times the action, total hardcore","reviewBody":"Well after that blunder of a motion picture called "Pearl Harbour" Micheal Bay bounces back with a better movie here. To his credit though in the few short films he has made so far none of them have bombed. This movie was 10x the action definately, and was actually way funnier than first one. Will Smith was definately more built, much tougher and more in charge, Martin Lawrence stole the show with his silly remarks every 5 seconds but I loved it. 

The car chase scene on the highway was way better than the Matrix Reloaded's car chase scene, it puts that one to shame. But this highway chase scene will definately rank up there with T3's. Some parts in this movie were a bit overdone such as the morgue scene, won't get into it but I'll leave it at that, and the rats...that's it! :)

If you are looking for a solid type performance from Will Smith to be a good actor don't bother, this movie was all about pure action, and mindless fun, if that's what you want then go see it, if not don't waste your 2 hours and 40 minutes seeing it. Funny thing is, it didn't feel that long.

Can't wait to see this out on DVD in superbit. A great sequel."},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":240483,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.6},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Action","Comedy","Crime"],"datePublished":"2003-09-10","keywords":"cuba,police,miami florida,sequel,anti hero","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Bad Boys 2","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2360869145","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZjEzY2QyYzItZjBmYS00MzgzLTllYmEtNzZhYjEwNGRlNjljXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZjEzY2QyYzItZjBmYS00MzgzLTllYmEtNzZhYjEwNGRlNjljXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Home Video Trailer from Columbia Tristar"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000226/","name":"Will Smith"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001454/","name":"Martin Lawrence"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005517/","name":"Gabrielle Union"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000881/","name":"Michael Bay"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0050868/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0102770/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0038663/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0303032/","name":"George Gallo"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0926729/","name":"Marianne Wibberley"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0926727/","name":"Cormac Wibberley"}],"duration":"PT2H27M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Nur Gott kann mich richten
Nur Gott kann mich richten
programme.desc: Nur Gott kann mich richten: Directed by Özgür Yildirim. With Neil Malik Abdullah, Kai Ivo Baulitz, Moritz Bleibtreu, Zejhun Demirov. After a botched robbery attempt five years ago, Ricky went to jail for his brother Rafael and his buddy Latif. Now that he is back out of jail, Latif wants to show his gratitude: he says he has a surefire scheme to get rich quickly, and Ricky could use the money to set up his new life. Ricky hesitates at first but then agrees. Complications arise as soon as some preparations start. Things kept going out in awry, especially as a form of hardup policewoman Diana." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt6175764/","name":"Nur Gott kann mich richten","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNjExZjMyMTItNWVjYy00M2U4LTllZTAtYzQwNDdkZmVkNDBiXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMzA3Njg4MzY@._V1_.jpg","description":"After a botched robbery attempt five years ago, Ricky went to jail for his brother Rafael and his buddy Latif. Now that he is back out of jail, Latif wants to show his gratitude: he says he has a surefire scheme to get rich quickly, ","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt6175764/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"jnthnlmk"},"dateCreated":"2019-09-01","inLanguage":"English","name":"Another epigone of the Pusher films by Refn","reviewBody":"Not a bad production, mostly because of good acting and kind of authentic sounding dialogues. But I wonder how many times this type of movie (authentic gangster trapped between family and milieu after a failed job) has to be made over and over again. The role model for this is clearly the Pusher trilogy by Nicolas Winding Refn. It seems to me, that these copies of his style function as practice fields for authenticity and so they will always be what they are: mediocre copies of the classics.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":6}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":1920,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.7},"genre":["Crime","Drama","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2018-01-25","keywords":"frankfurt germany,botched robbery,jail,revenge,strong female character","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Trailer [OV]","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3918510873","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZjc2NzdlYjgtNzQ5OC00NzAzLWEwZTMtYTk1MWViMWJmOTI1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRodW1ibmFpbC1pbml0aWFsaXplcg@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZjc2NzdlYjgtNzQ5OC00NzAzLWEwZTMtYTk1MWViMWJmOTI1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRodW1ibmFpbC1pbml0aWFsaXplcg@@._V1_.jpg","description":""},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2494529/","name":"Neil Malik Abdullah"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0062049/","name":"Kai Ivo Baulitz"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001953/","name":"Moritz Bleibtreu"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1641324/","name":"Özgür Yildirim"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0002257/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0612398/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0065798/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1641324/","name":"Özgür Yildirim"}],"duration":"PT1H40M"}</script><metacontent="

It seems to me, that these copies of his style function as practice fields for authenticity and so they will always be what they are: mediocre copies of the classics.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":6,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":1920,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.7,"genre":["Crime","Drama","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2018-01-25","keywords":"frankfurt germany,botched robbery,jail,revenge,strong female character","trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Trailer [OV]","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3918510873","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZjc2NzdlYjgtNzQ5OC00NzAzLWEwZTMtYTk1MWViMWJmOTI1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRodW1ibmFpbC1pbml0aWFsaXplcg@@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZjc2NzdlYjgtNzQ5OC00NzAzLWEwZTMtYTk1MWViMWJmOTI1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRodW1ibmFpbC1pbml0aWFsaXplcg@@._V1_.jpg","description":"","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2494529/","name":"Neil Malik Abdullah","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0062049/","name":"Kai Ivo Baulitz","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001953/","name":"Moritz Bleibtreu"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1641324/","name":"Özgür Yildirim"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0002257/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0612398/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0065798/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1641324/","name":"Özgür Yildirim"],"duration":"PT1H40M"</script><metacontent="

programme.title: The Recruit
Der Einsatz
programme.desc:
The Recruit: Directed by Roger Donaldson. With Al Pacino, Colin Farrell, Bridget Moynahan, Gabriel Macht. A brilliant young CIA trainee is asked by his mentor to help find a mole in the Agency." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0292506/","name":"The Recruit","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjE5MDMzOTk3MV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTYwNTE0NTg2._V1_.jpg","description":"A brilliant young CIA trainee is asked by his mentor to help find a mole in the Agency.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0292506/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"philip_vanderveken"},"dateCreated":"2005-04-20","inLanguage":"English","name":"Not the most original thriller, but it does exactly what you can expect from it.","reviewBody":"For some reason or another, this movie wasn't really accepted by the majority of the audience and I wonder why that is. I'm not saying it is a masterpiece, but this is still a movie with Al Pacino and Colin Farrell. Both actors and especially Al Pacino are normally good for some decent fun and some good acting and it wasn't any different in this movie.

This movie tells us the story of James Clayton (Colin Farrell), a young computer graduate who is recruited by Walter Burke (Al Pacino) to work for the CIA. Despite Clayton's unconventional attitude, Burke sees in him one of the best agents the CIA can wish for. That's why he'll guide Clayton through the difficult training courses and helps him to quickly rise through the ranks. Once the training period is over Clayton gets a special assignment, he'll have to detect a mole that has infiltrated in the CIA. But will his training be enough and was Burke right about the fact that this may well be the best agent ever?

This movie is perhaps not the most original thriller ever, but it delivers everything that it is asked for. It's a good movie, full of suspense and decent acting. And for those who are interested: it also gives an insight on how the trainees are recruited, how they are prepared to be a spy and what they learn to survive. I don't know anything about it, but I guess it all looked pretty accurate. Anyway, I enjoyed watching this movie and I give it a 7.5/10.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":132626,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.6},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Action","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2003-04-30","keywords":"recruit,training,watching tv,jefferson memorial,smithsonian institute","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"The Recruit","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi499253529","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNDlhYTM4ZWItOTE3OC00ZjVkLWI0OWMtOTUxZGIxMDljZGU4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNDlhYTM4ZWItOTE3OC00ZjVkLWI0OWMtOTUxZGIxMDljZGU4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"CT #2 Post"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000199/","name":"Al Pacino"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0268199/","name":"Colin Farrell"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005256/","name":"Bridget Moynahan"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0002044/","name":"Roger Donaldson"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0049348/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0031181/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0166202/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0870013/","name":"Roger Towne"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0934483/","name":"Kurt Wimmer"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0322248/","name":"Mitch Glazer"}],"duration":"PT1H55M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: The November Man
The November Man
programme.desc:
The November Man: Directed by Roger Donaldson. With Pierce Brosnan, Luke Bracey, Olga Kurylenko, Bill Smitrovich. An ex-C.I.A. operative is brought back in on a very personal mission and finds himself pitted against his former pupil in a deadly game involving high level C.I.A. officials and the Russian President-elect." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt2402157/","name":"The November Man","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNTkzMDk5NjUxNV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMzMwOTMyMjE@._V1_.jpg","description":"An ex-C.I.A. operative is brought back in on a very personal mission and finds himself pitted against his former pupil in a deadly game involving high level C.I.A. officials and the Russian President-elect.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt2402157/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Hellmant"},"dateCreated":"2014-09-19","inLanguage":"English","name":"I'd say it's better than about half of the James Bond movies.","reviewBody":"'THE November MAN': Three and a Half Stars (Out of Five)

Spy thriller starring Pierce Brosnan as an ex-CIA agent who must take on an old pupil, when his former employers kill the woman he loves and target him for assassination. The movie was directed by Roger Donaldson; who's directed such popular hits as 'COCTAIL', 'CADILLAC MAN', 'THE BOUNTY', 'SPECIES' and 'DANTE'S PEAK' (which also stars Brosnan). It was written by Michael Finch and Karl Gajdusek and based on the book 'There Are No Spies' (which is the seventh installment in 'The November Man' series) by Bill Granger. It costars Luke Bracey, Olga Kurylenko, Bill Smitrovich and Will Patton. I found it to be pretty entertaining and surprisingly dark, and violent, but still nothing too new or interesting to offer fans of the genre.

Brosnan plays Peter Devereaux; an ex-CIA agent who retired after a student of his, David Mason (Bracey), accidentally killed a kid (while the two were doing an assignment together in Montenegro). Since that time Peter has started a relationship with another CIA operative, named Natalia Ulanova (Mediha Musilovic). He comes out of retirement to aid her on a deep cover assignment in Russia, when she's murdered by Mason; under the orders of CIA chief Perry Weinstein (Patton). Peter then wants revenge on the CIA, for killing Natalia, and will stop at nothing to find out what vital information she uncovered and why she was killed for it.

The story is that of a pretty routine espionage thriller but it does take some pretty dark turns, here and there. Both Brosnan and Bracey's characters do some pretty questionable 'anti-heroic' things that, at times, leave the viewer questioning who they're supposed to root for. So in that way I really enjoyed the movie. Brosnan does slip back into the ultimate spy role with plenty of ease and Donaldson does a pretty effective job delivering the action. Kurylenko looks stunning as usual (and even uncannily resembles a young Catherine Zeta-Jones in some scenes). The film might not have much original to offer, fans of the genre, but it's still a lot of fun; I'd even say it's better than about half of the James Bond movies.

Watch our movie review show 'MOVIE TALK' at: http://youtu.be/NiZxP8LDXto","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":66116,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.3},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Action","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2014-08-27","keywords":"stripper,premarital sex,sex standing up,sex scene,belgrade serbia","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Trailer #2","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3721243673","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTc2NTAxMjUwNV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNjY4NTIzMzE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTc2NTAxMjUwNV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNjY4NTIzMzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"An ex-CIA operative is brought back in on a very personal mission and finds himself pitted against his former pupil in a deadly game involving high level CIA officials and the Russian president-elect.
"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000112/","name":"Pierce Brosnan"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3478396/","name":"Luke Bracey"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1385871/","name":"Olga Kurylenko"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0002044/","name":"Roger Donaldson"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0142678/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0088199/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0500612/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3360218/","name":"Michael Finch"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2244980/","name":"Karl Gajdusek"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1952653/","name":"Bill Granger"}],"duration":"PT1H48M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: The Patriot
Der Patriot
programme.desc:
The Patriot: Directed by Roland Emmerich. With Mel Gibson, Heath Ledger, Joely Richardson, Jason Isaacs. Peaceful farmer Benjamin Martin is driven to lead the Colonial Militia during the American Revolution when a sadistic British officer murders his son." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0187393/","name":"The Patriot","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTkzMjE4ODU0MV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTYwNTI2OTk2._V1_.jpg","description":"Peaceful farmer Benjamin Martin is driven to lead the Colonial Militia during the American Revolution when a sadistic British officer murders his son.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0187393/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"ma-cortes"},"dateCreated":"2021-06-15","inLanguage":"English","name":"An epic and moving film with big name cast , emotion , violence , and impressive battles","reviewBody":"Spectacular and breathtaking film about the American Independence War dealing with an enjoyable family and the tragic events happening along the way . Benjamin Martin : Mel Gibson is a conscientious objector due to previous wars he suffered and he is nowadays a widower of seven children : Heath Ledger , Logan Lerman , Gregory Smith, Mika Boorem, Sky Bartusiak , Trevor Morgan ... He is a former guerrilla soldier who just wants to raise his family in peace . Unfortunately , local Redcoats as Col. Tavington : Jason Isaacs , underlings : Adam Baldwin , and commander-in-chief : Tom Wilkinson have other ideas . When Martin's idealistic soldier son Gabriel : Aussie Ledger is captured , daddy gets caught in action . What would you do if they destroyed your home , threatened your family . Where would you draw the line ? Before they were soldiers , they were family . Before they were legends , they were heroes . Before there was a nation , there was a fight for freedom . Some things are worth fighting for .

Revolutionary War vengeance pic with thrills , noisy action , overwhelming fights and well-played . The main character and central axis of the movie results to be Benjamin Martin/Mel Gibson, magnificently performed , as a bloodied veteran of the French and Indian Wars , and a few years later a pacifist , but his pacifism owes as much to pragmatism as conviction to defend and care his several children . A violently idealist movie dealing with historical events about the Independence War , battles between Colonians and British army . Alongside the great Mel Gibson appears the early deceased Heath Ledger and a large cast of secondaries giving sensational performances , such as : Chris Cooper , Tom Wilkinson, Joely Richardson , Tcheky Karyo , Donald Logue , Adam Baldwin, Leon Rippy , Rene Auberjonois and special mention for Jason Issacs providing a really baddie role as sadistic colonel.

Adding a rousing and attractive musical score from maestro John Williams, Steven Spielberg's regular. As well as colorful and brilliant cinematography from Caleb Deschanel. This overlong , bloody and melodramatic motion picture was compellingly produced -along with Dean Devlin- and directed by Roland Emmerich (The Day after tomorrow , Godzilla , Independence Day , Stargate , Universal Soldier , Moon 44 , Ghost Chase, Joey) . Rating : 7.5/10. Better than average . The flick will appeal to Mel Gibson fans . Worthwhile watching .","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":263323,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.2},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Action","Drama","History"],"datePublished":"2000-07-19","keywords":"american revolution,hero,standoff,father son relationship,george washington character","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"The Patriot","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi100139289","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODcxNjY2N2MtNjllYy00OGE1LTgxMmYtZjYwOTc2MzEyYzVjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODcxNjY2N2MtNjllYy00OGE1LTgxMmYtZjYwOTc2MzEyYzVjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Home Video Trailer from Touchstone Pictures"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000154/","name":"Mel Gibson"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005132/","name":"Heath Ledger"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000613/","name":"Joely Richardson"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000386/","name":"Roland Emmerich"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0050868/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0050111/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0007500/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0734441/","name":"Robert Rodat"}],"duration":"PT2H45M"}</script><metacontent="
